alert.note: Alert for De Kalb; La Salle; Lee (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Chicago (Northeastern Illinois and Northwestern Indiana)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 31 at 4:28PM CDT until March 31 at 5:00PM CDT by NWS Chicago
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 500 PM CDT FOR NORTHERN LA SALLE...SOUTHEASTERN LEE AND SOUTHERN DE KALB COUNTIES... At 427 PM CDT, a cluster of severe thunderstorms was located northern La Salle county moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. Locations impacted include... Sandwich, Mendota, Sheridan, Lake Holiday, Somonauk, Earlville, Leland, Paw Paw, Millington, Troy Grove, Triumph and Harding. This includes... Sandwich Fairgrounds and Tri-County Fairgrounds. Including the following interstate... I-39 between mile markers 65 and 77. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for north central and northeastern Illinois. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
